definition.config: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="config_start" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">Inventory</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">force_one_slot</field><field name="comment">Forces you to have one hotbar slot. This will look broken as the hotbar texture only includes one hotbar slot.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">forceOneSlot</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">force_right_click_pickup</field><field name="comment">Forces you to right click each dropped item to pick it up.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">forceRightClickPickup</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">Tripping</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">tripping_enabled</field><field name="comment">Enables or Disables the Tripping mechanic.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">enabled</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">tripping_timer_min</field><field name="comment">Sets the minimum amount of time that has to pass between each time you trip.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">timer.min</field><field name="value">300</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">tripping_timer_max</field><field name="comment">Sets the maximum amount of time that has to pass between each time you trip.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">timer.max</field><field name="value">6000</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
